title: The Return
description: In his final encounter with the Bearded Man, William Balder ended it all, locked the powers away and banished him for good.William Balder thought he was down with his misadventures.He was dead wrong. The Bearded Man is back.Once again, William is forced to flee, leaving a path of terror in his wake. Will's journey through insanity... Are you ready?This book is available for purchase at http://thundernetworks.info/TrevorAut...
author: Trevor Couturier
